content: Mr. McCain, Your statement gives me hope. I have been watching the direction we have been going in and the attempt to establish control through fear and division. My late father-in-law was a colonel in WWII, the Korean War, and Vietnam. I know, if he was in your place, he would not stand by for the erosion of our values and I am going to trust that you will follow your heart. Don’t let this happen to our beautiful country.
